episodes.title: The French Drop
episodes.plot: February 1941: A local murder investigation sidetracks Foyle's endeavor to pursue a position that would contribute more to the war effort as he finds himself caught between rival spy organizations.

episodes.title: Enemy Fire
episodes.plot: February 1941: When a manor house is commandeered as a special burn unit for treating injured RAF pilots, Foyle is called in to investigate a series of accidents.

episodes.title: They Fought in the Fields
episodes.plot: April 1941: Foyle questions three Land Army girls about a murder that occurs on a Hastings farm.

episodes.title: A War of Nerves
episodes.plot: June 1941: A.C. Rose orders Foyle to delegate his investigation of black marketing ring and personally look into the possibly seditious acts of a Socialist activist.
